argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatval.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatval.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` A ) |
| 6 |  | scmatval.s | |- S = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> S = { m e. B | E. c e. K m = ( c .x. .1. ) } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. S <-> M e. { m e. B | E. c e. K m = ( c .x. .1. ) } ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( m = M -> ( m = ( c .x. .1. ) <-> M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rexbidv | |- ( m = M -> ( E. c e. K m = ( c .x. .1. ) <-> E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_elrab | |- ( M e. { m e. B | E. c e. K m = ( c .x. .1. ) } <-> ( M e. B /\ E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. S <-> ( M e. B /\ E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) ) ) |
